name: 音樂記譜之詮釋與演奏（二）
description:
Performance Practice II is designed for performing, score-reading, analyzing and interpreting 20th-century repertoire. The course is project-based and in the form of INDIVIDUAL PRACTICE, OPEN REHEARSAL and COACHING. A performance or recording session is expected to be the final presentation/result.

Here is the repertoire:

*Schoenberg - Pierrot Lunaire (1912)
flute, clarinet, violin, cello, piano and a vocalist

*Stravinsky - Ragtime (1918)
https://youtu.be/c7sA4h772Dc
flute, clarinet, two horns, trombone, big drum, snare drum, side drum, cymbals, cimbalom, first and second violin, viola and double bass.

Maurice Ravel - Sonata for Violin and Cello, M. 73 (1920-1922)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-z_Ee3E3C0Q

*Bohuslav Martinu - La revue de cuisine (1927)
https://youtu.be/8dHeotRcTag
clarinet (B-flat), bassoon, trumpet (B-flat), violin, cello, piano

*Bohuslav Martinu (1890-1959): Jazz Suite (1928)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QCVSYVhkqSA
ob cl bsn 2-trp 2-trb pno 2-vln vla

Messiaen - Quartet for the end of time (1941)
https://youtu.be/Me-c7p3LQuY
vln vc cl pno

Ligeti - 6 Bagatelles (1951-53)
https://youtu.be/txMWXvD8kL4
wwq

*Ligeti - Chamber Concerto for 13 Instruments (1969-70)
https://youtu.be/fYh9qDwBTE8
flute (doubling piccolo), oboe (doubling English horn), clarinet, bass clarinet, horn, tenor trombone, harpsichord (doubling harmonium), piano (doubling celesta), and string quintet.

*Luciano Berio: Folk Songs for mezzo-soprano and 7 instruments (1964-1973)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fIYQbNB1Om0
fl, cl, perc(2), hp(or guit), vla(1), vc(1)

Crumb - Black Angels (1970)
https://youtu.be/etHtCVeU4-I
sq

*Pierre Boulez - D?rive 1 (1984)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RZDKMVqkbpQ
fl, cl(A), vib, pno, vln, vc 

Berio - Sequenza (from this series, any instrumental solo) (1958-2002)

Harvey - The Riot (1993)
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=hOvzoo1d38I&feature=youtu.be
fl bass-cl pno
goals: 表演、閱讀樂譜、分析和詮釋 20 世紀曲目
syllabus:
本學期課程「音樂記譜之詮釋與演奏（二）」將以二十世紀音樂的曲目為基，以實際演奏出發，從記譜分析而至詮釋討論，最終以呈現、演出或錄音，做為課程成果。

本課程原為碩博演奏組課程，大學部學生可由授課教師同意其演奏或創作能力符合修課標準後，給予加簽。

課程形式將以Project-based為導向，演奏/指揮組學生應在本學期曲目中，選擇至少2首作品（亦可師生討論後，適度調整），參與OPEN REHEARSAL、COACHING，以及PERFORMANCE或RECORDING SESSION等進程。創作/音樂學組學生參與課程之方式以記譜分析、詮釋討論與排練觀摩為主，亦須協助執行排練事宜。

因此課程進行方式以責任制與選擇制，以選擇需完成曲目之組別為基，彈性參與課程與額外排練時間之規劃。細節於課程初再共同討論確立。

本學期二十世紀音樂曲目與其參考影音與編制：

**\*Schoenberg - Pierrot Lunaire (1912)**  
flute, clarinet, violin, cello, piano and a vocalist
